alert.note: Alert for Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 19 at 1:30AM MST until February 19 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT THIS AFTERNOON AND EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, west winds 40 to 50 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected. For the High Wind Watch, west winds 40 to 60 mph with gusts up to 90 mph possible. * WHERE...Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from noon CST /11 AM MST/ today to midnight CST /11 PM MST/ tonight. For the High Wind Watch, from Monday afternoon through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Severe turbulence will be hazardous for low flying aircraft.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
